title: Leading European city tourism destinations in 2018 , by number of bednights
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of bednights in millions for 15 number of European City Destinations.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.
The highest European City Destination London has 60.4 more Number of bednights in millions than the lowest European City Destination Lisbon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing European City Destination, and Number of bednights in millions in each European City Destination on the y axis.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of bednights in millions for 15 number of European City Destinations.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
The difference of Number of bednights in millions between the highest and lowest European City Destination is 60.4.
Number of bednights in millions at European City Destination London is 71.16 , second place is  at 71.16, and thirdly is Berlin at 32.87.
The European City Destination London tends to be 2.91 percent higher than average.
The Number of bednights in millions is 367.12 if we add up values of all European City Destinations.
